            <ns0:field>Description</ns0:field>
            <ns0:value>
                <ns0:elementReference>description2</ns0:elementReference>
            </ns0:value>
        </ns0:inputAssignments>
        <ns0:inputAssignments>
            <ns0:field>FirstName</ns0:field>
            <ns0:value>

        </ns0:inputAssignments>
        <ns0:inputAssignments>
            <ns0:field>LastName</ns0:field>
            <ns0:value>
                <ns0:elementReference>Last_Name</ns0:elementReference>
            </ns0:value>
        </ns0:inputAssignments>
        <ns0:inputAssignments>
            <ns0:field>Phone</ns0:field>
            <ns0:value>
                <ns0:elementReference>Phone</ns0:elementReference>
            </ns0:value>
        </ns0:inputAssignments>
        <ns0:inputAssignments>
            <ns0:field>Title</ns0:field>
            <ns0:value>
                <ns0:elementReference>title</ns0:elementReference>
            </ns0:value>
        </ns0:inputAssignments>
        <ns0:object>Lead</ns0:object>
    </ns0:recordCreates>

flow.source_text:
<fields xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata">
            <name>Last_Name</name>
            <dataType>String</dataType>
            <fieldText>Last Name</fieldText>
            <fieldType>InputField</fieldType>
            <isRequired>true</isRequired>
        </fields>

<formulas xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata">
        <description>randomizes last name via concatenation</description>
        <name>random_last_name</name>
        <dataType>String</dataType>
        <expression>{!Last_Name}&SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(NOW()),"-", ""), ":","")</expression>
    </formulas>

<assignmentItems xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata">
            <assignToReference>fixed_last_name</assignToReference>
            <operator>Assign</operator>
            <value>
                <elementReference>random_last_name</elementReference>
            </value>
        </assignmentItems>

<fields xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata">
            <name>Last_Name</name>
            <dataType>String</dataType>
            <fieldText>Last Name</fieldText>
            <fieldType>InputField</fieldType>
            <isRequired>true</isRequired>
        </fields>

<formulas xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata">
        <description>randomizes last name via concatenation</description>
        <name>random_last_name</name>
        <dataType>String</dataType>
        <expression>{!Last_Name}&SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(NOW()),"-", ""), ":","")</expression>
    </formulas>

<assignmentItems xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata">
            <assignToReference>fixed_last_name</assignToReference>
            <operator>Assign</operator>
            <value>
                <elementReference>random_last_name</elementReference>
            </value>
        </assignmentItems>
